statement.p: An online fax company, EFaxIt.com, has a customer plan where a subscriber pays a monthly subscription fee of 15.75 dollars and can send/receive 60 fax pages at no additional cost. For each page sent or received past the 60 page limit, the customer must pay an overage fee of 0.05 per page. The following expression gives the total cost, in dollars, to send \displaystyle{p} pages beyond the plan's monthly limit.
If the monthly bill under this plan comes out to be 18.05, what was the total number of pages that were sent or received?
Answer: The total number of pages sent/received was .
